title: SCOTUS Segregation and the Fourteenth Amendment

content.prompt: In which case did the Supreme Court hold that race based school segregation violated the Equal Protection Clause of the Fourteenth Amendment?

choices.label: Tinker v. Des Moines Independent Community School District (1969)
Engel v. Vitale (1962)
Brown v. Board of Education of Topeka (1954)

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Explain how a required Supreme Court case relates to a foundational document or to other primary or secondary sources.
